description:
I don't think I've ever met anyone as nervous about his first time in front of the camera as Gary was. Before I turned on the camera he was just pacing around the room and I though that he was going to hyperventilate.
I assumed that this video was going to be a hard one to shoot because Gary was a "first timer" and the fact that he was so nervous probably meant that he wouldn't be able to get it up.
So, I was really surprised when I turned on the camera and had him take his clothes off. He slipped off his pants and his dick popped out, already semi-erect. He started tickling his dick like a pro and before I knew it he was rock hard and smiling at the camera.
After we finished the video, he got real nervous again and wasn't sure that he wanted it to go public (he was afraid that his parents would see it). I talked to him for quite a while and in the end he was OK with it. Good thing, too, because I really think this kid is a natural.
title: Gary
